title: 108: The Biggest Fraud Of Our Lifetime
description:
If at the start of 2020 someone told you that by the end of the year most restaurants would be shut down and everyone would be wearing masks just to enter the ones that were “allowed” to open, you would think they had lost their grip on reality. And you would be correct in your assessment.

The problem is that reality itself has changed, or more accurately, has been changed. Those responsible for one of the largest frauds in the history of the world are still in positions of power and authority and anyone who rightly points out that the Emperor has no clothes is shunned, de-platformed, disowned by their families, or outright locked up.

What is the truth about the COVID-19 psychological operation, what do the numbers tell us, why is the media lying, and what is the endgame for these social engineers?
